metadata.title: CVE-2024-0567 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in GnuTLS, where a cockpit (which uses gnuTLS)rejects a certificate chain with distributed trust. This issue occurs whenvalidating a certificate chain with cockpit-certificate-ensure. This flawallows an unauthenticated, remote client or attacker to initiate a denialof service attack.

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
